availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas J. Jett (Franklin County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Franklin County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Held one slave in 1860.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District 2, p. 104. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District 2, p. 97. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District 2, p. 14. Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registrations, 1863-1865, Ancestry, Kentucky, Seventh Congressional District, Franklin County, 1863, p. 14. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Court House Precinct, p. 17. “Thomas Jefferson Jett,” Find A Grave, memorial no. 82410748 (accessed May 23, 2017).
